attributes.title: my grandma had a heart attack
attributes.review: so my entire family is democratic and hates trump. i hate trump too but i wanted to see if there was actually some good in him. so i downloaded the app to look through it. the app is poorly made btw. would not recommend. so one day my grandma was looking through my phone cause she‚Äôs weird and saw the trump app! she was so shocked and upset she had a heart attack and died. i‚Äôm writing this at her funeral today. thanks a lot trump, you killed my grandma.
